text: neohuileul changjohasin bun-i hananim-isila geubunkkeseoneun neohuiege il-yonghal yangsig-eul jusieossgo ttohan geubun kkeseoneun neohuiui saengmyeong-eul as-agamyeo tto neohuiege saengmyeong-eul jusinola neo huiga seomgineun usangjung-e ileohan il eul hanalado hal su issneun usang-i issneunyo geuleomeulo geubun-eul chanmihalageubun-eun geudeul-i sungbaehaneun modeun geos wie nop-i gyesinila
